title: New chroma skins can't be picked in old champ select
body: I can't pick the new chromas (Yasuo, MF, Xin Zhao, etc.) in the old champ select.

replies.body: I can't pick even the old chromas any more.  Just had a game with Nami and it would't let me pick her chroma for Koi so looks like you guys broke them

Hey! 

Sorry to hear you can't select a chroma you've purchased. We're aware of this issue and could use your help to investigate. Please answer as many of these questions as you can so we can figure out why this is happening. ^-^

- Did you purchase this chroma shortly before you tried to use it?
- Have you logged out of League since purchasing the chroma?
- Have you used the chroma in a game at all so far? If so, which queue?
- Download the Hextech Repair Tool so we can collect your air client logs: https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi

Once youâ€™ve run the repair tool, a .zip file will be created on your desktop that includes your logs. Once you've got it, shoot it over to me and we can take a closer look and see what's not working on our end.
